SEARCH
Package bsiopis.webapp.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
bsiopis.webapp.controller.UserController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/user") public class UserController extends Object
User Controller. Self explanatory. The main class of the entire web application. User Controller class contains the mapping to all the pages of the web application which are used to control the user objects. Whenever an HTTP Request is done on the web page it passes through this controller class.
Since:
2022-12-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bill Siopis

      public UserController()

  • Method Details

    • initBinder

      @InitBinder public void initBinder(org.springframework.web.bind.WebDataBinder dataBinder)
      initBinder method is responsible for clearing out all whitespace included in the user inputs.
      Parameters:
      dataBinder - is used for data binding from web request parameters to JavaBean objects.

    • listUser

      @GetMapping("/list") public String listUser(org.springframework.ui.Model theModel)
      listUser method is responsible for calling the Service method getUser() to create a list of the users stored in the database.
      Parameters:
      theModel - is used as a container for data. The Model interface functions are used to pass data into the jsp the function is mapped to.
      Returns:
      Returns the list-users.jsp page address.

    • register

      @GetMapping("/register") public String register(org.springframework.ui.Model theModel)
      register method is responsible for creating the user object that the user input will be saved to and returning to the registration page for it to be saved.
      Parameters:
      theModel - is used as a container for data. The Model interface functions are used to pass data into the jsp the function is mapped to.
      Returns:
      Returns the register.jsp page address.

    • saveUser

      @PostMapping("/saveUser") public String saveUser(@Valid @ModelAttribute("user") @Valid UserInput user, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      Method saveUser is used for validation of the user input via @Valid annotation and for passing the user input into the saveUser method of the Service layer. The user input is annotated by @ModelAttribute in order to have the values inputed in the webpage.
      Parameters:
      user - The user input stored in a UserInput temp object in order to pass all the values correctly.
      bindingResult - is the variable that holds any possible errors in the validation in order be checked with an if function.
      Returns:
      Returns the address to the success.jsp if there are no errors in the submitted data.

    • userDetails

      @GetMapping("/details") public String userDetails(@RequestParam("userId") int Id, org.springframework.ui.Model theModel)
      userDetails method is used to call the method getUser() from the Service layer with an input of a userId to find a specific record.
      Parameters:
      Id - A value of a user ID is obtained via a @RequestParam annotation and passed in the method in order to search for a record with that id number.
      theModel - is used as a container for data. The Model interface functions are used to pass data into the jsp the function is mapped to.
      Returns:
      Returns the user-details.jsp page address.

    • searchUsers

      @GetMapping("/search") public String searchUsers(@RequestParam(value="searchName",defaultValue="") String searchName, org.springframework.ui.Model theModel)
      searchUsers method is used to call the searchUsers method of the Service Layer passing through a searchName variable given by user input.
      Parameters:
      searchName - is the variable gained by user input via the @RequestParam annotation. It is used to determine which users are to be searched for.
      theModel - is used as a container for data. The Model interface functions are used to pass data into the jsp the function is mapped to.
      Returns:
      Returns the list-users.jsp page address.
